scripts.postinstall: lerna exec -- yarn && lerna run prepare
scripts.reinstall: lerna exec -- rimraf node_modules && rimraf node_modules && yarn
scripts.predeploy: yarn && yarn clean && yarn build && yarn lint && yarn test
scripts.watch: trap "kill 0" SIGINT; for f in `ls exchanges`; do (cd `pwd`/exchanges/$f && yarn run watch) & done;
